name: #USL Cryo-Freeze Cargo Holds
desc:
Proprietary USL cargo hold conversion allows storing and transport of USL packaged cryo-cargo.

Increases supply and fuel usage by %s/%s/%s/%s.

name: USL Parcel-Sorting Cargo Holds
desc:
Proprietary USL cargo hold conversion allows interfacing with USL dock facilities for automatic parcel sorting during loading and unloading operations, as well as in-flight repackaging and optimization. The parcel sorter cannot be removed while USL parcels are onboard any of your ships.

Increases supply usage by %s/%s/%s/%s.
